title: dōcō by Renfe
description: Making end2end Mobility Easier in Any Territory.
subtitle: Branding, Service, CX & EX Management, Digital Product...
body:
Renfe and Chazz worked together with the objective of creating a new mobility as a service value proposition adapted to society needs under the paradigm of sustainable travel. The mobility sector is a fragmented and complex, so we shaped a tangible travel experience, making possible that any kind of trip becomes an enchanting and seamless experience walk. 
That is why dōcō is not only technology, but also empathy, since it adapts to diverse lifestyles allowing the user to search, plan and book their expected trip in a short and user-friendly way combining multimodal options of transport included in one single ticket.

caseInfo.title: Making Mobility Easier in Any Territory.
caseInfo.services: Services Research, Strategy Design, Brand, Product Design

sections.firstFWClaim: Developing the complete Mobility As A Service’s project with Renfe, the Spanish leader in rail transport.

leftColumn.leftColumnIntro: Mobility is a saturated and complex sector, and society needs a friendly proposal to move easily under the paradigm of sustainable travelling.

paragraph.text: Our focus was to bring a new product that helps people move around any spanish territory joining together technology and creativity. Knowing consumers' needs and motivations we shaped a tangible travel experience, making possible that any kind of trip becomes an enchanting and seamless experience. dōcō adapts to diverse lifestyles allowing the user to search, plan and book their expected trip in an user-friendly way combining multimodal options of transport included in one single ticket. dōcō’s essence is an holistic approach to the chaotic times we are living but it is also, in fact, a lifestyle itself that allows consumers to plan with no worries and no rush.

rightColumnOnlyInfoSection.paragraph: We created the mobility service solution that provides a wide range of co-partners with transport options such bicycles, scooters, motorcycles, taxis, VTCs, buses and trains, in order to empower multimodal mobility, and of course freedom. We knew that an elevated product like this need a clear strategy. dōcō's value proposition is to promote multimodal mobility removing the uncertainty of any type of trip. So the service and the brand are inclusive. That is why no matter who we are or where we go, but dōcō can accompany us in an empathic way. That is the reason why its logotype is friendly and its visual style flowed with a witty mood, and an AAA color palette, a complete icon set, and a unique typography that was designed to make real the visual ecosystem of this new brand by Renfe.

sections.secondFWClaim: Creating a new mobility service adapted to society and environment’s needs

fifthFWImageWithCaption.caption: So the service and the brand are inclusive.  Because no matter who we are or where we go, but dōcō can accompany us in an empathic way. That is why its logotype is friendly and its visual style flowed with a witty mood. An AAA color palette, a complete icon set, and a unique typography was designed to make real.
